lines.text: You want something, Michael. I'll give you something. He named his dog after Ronald Reagan.
Nothing. They got more guns in that part of the county than people.
She has trouble about killing Old Wes. How do you feel about dropping that piece of shit, Al?
Terrific! Like cleaning something off my shoe.

[after the murder of a black man]
Come on, Katie. Come on now. Just a nigger. Don't make too much out of it. There's plenty more where he came from.
You promised me I wouldn't get dirty. You were using me. You're still using me!
You're letting me use you. Everybody uses everybody, girl. It's just a matter of what we're being used for. What it is... the only important thing.

[about Jack Carpenter]
You hitched your wagon to him? What did you do that for Bobby? Why man, why?
Gary what did I keep telling you in 'Nam? I said you were the best point man I ever saw but stick to that. Don't do anything else. Leave the formation to me.
But look at him Bobby. There's nothing inside. And what are you going to do when the shit hits the fan? When he's caught stealing money or dicking some jailbait?

[entering he bank with mask and gun]
Good morning! We rob banks!

[about Gary]
This guy smells too good. He's the kind of guy who needs an Alamo to defend. He's perfect!
